TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi abstract sealed beforefieldinit ZipFile extends System.Object
public ref class ZipFile abstract sealed

summary.span: 提供创建、解压缩和打开 zip 存档的静态方法。

span.span: Provides static methods for creating, extracting, and opening zip archives.

remarks.format: ## Remarks > [!IMPORTANT] > 若要使用 类，必须在项目中添加对 `System.IO.Compression.FileSystem` 程序集的引用;否则，在尝试编译时，会收到以下错误消息：**名称 "ZipFile" 在当前上下文中不存在**。To use the class, you must add a reference to the `System.IO.Compression.FileSystem` assembly in your project; otherwise, you'll get the following error message when trying to compile : **The name 'ZipFile' does not exist in the current context**. 有关如何在 Visual Studio 中添加对项目的引用的详细信息，请参阅[如何：使用引用管理器添加或删除引用](/visualstudio/ide/how-to-add-or-remove-references-by-using-the-reference-manager)。For more information on how to add a reference to your project in Visual Studio, see [How to: Add or Remove References By Using the Reference Manager](/visualstudio/ide/how-to-add-or-remove-references-by-using-the-reference-manager). 操作 zip 存档及其文件的方法分布于三个类中： 、 和 。The methods for manipulating zip archives and their files are spread across three classes: , and . |自...To…|使用...Use…| |---------|----------| |从目录创建 zip 存档Create a zip archive from a directory|| |将 zip 存档的内容提取到目录Extract the contents of a zip archive to a directory|| |将新文件添加到现有 zip 存档Add new files to an existing zip archive|| |在 zip 存档中检索文件Retrieve an file in a zip archive|| |检索 zip 存档中的所有文件Retrieve all of the files in a zip archive|| |打开 zip 存档中包含的单个文件的流To open a stream to an individual file contained in a zip archive|| |删除 zip 存档中的文件Delete a file from a zip archive|| 不能在 [!INCLUDE[win8_appname_long](~/includes/win8-appname-long-md.md)] 应用中使用 或 类。You cannot use the or classes in [!INCLUDE[win8_appname_long](~/includes/win8-appname-long-md.md)] apps. 在 [!INCLUDE[win8_appname_long](~/includes/win8-appname-long-md.md)] 应用程序中，应使用以下类来处理压缩的文件。In [!INCLUDE[win8_appname_long](~/includes/win8-appname-long-md.md)] apps, you should use the following classes to work with compressed files. - - - - ## Examples 此示例演示如何使用 类创建和提取 zip 存档。This example shows how to create and extract a zip archive by using the class. 它将文件夹的内容压缩为 zip 存档，然后将该内容提取到新文件夹中。It compresses the contents of a folder into a zip archive, and then extracts that content to a new folder. > [!TIP] > 若要使用 类，必须在项目中引用 `System.IO.Compression.FileSystem` 程序集。To use the class, you must reference the `System.IO.Compression.FileSystem` assembly in your project. [!code-csharp[System.IO.Compression.ZipFile#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.io.compression.zipfile/cs/program1.cs#1)] [!code-vb[System.IO.Compression.ZipFile#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.io.compression.zipfile/vb/program1.vb#1)]

related.span: 如何：使用引用管理器添加或删除引用

span.span: How to: Add or Remove References By Using the Reference Manager

summary.span: 创建 zip 存档，该存档包含指定目录的文件和目录。

span.span: Creates a zip archive that contains the files and directories from the specified directory.

Public Shared Sub CreateFromDirectory (sourceDirectoryName As String, destinationArchiveFileName As String)
public: static void CreateFromDirectory(System::String ^ sourceDirectoryName, System::String ^ destinationArchiveFileName);
static member CreateFromDirectory : string * string -> unit

param.name: sourceDirectoryName
param.span: 到要存档的目录的路径，指定为相对路径或绝对路径。

span.span: The path to the directory to be archived, specified as a relative or absolute path.

param.span: 相对路径是指相对于当前工作目录的路径。

span.span: A relative path is interpreted as relative to the current working directory.

param.name: destinationArchiveFileName
param.span: 要生成的存档路径，指定为相对路径或绝对路径。

span.span: The path of the archive to be created, specified as a relative or absolute path.

param.span: 相对路径被解释为相对于当前工作目录。

span.span: A relative path is interpreted as relative to the current working directory.

summary.span: 创建 zip 存档，该存档包含指定目录的文件和目录。

span.span: Creates a zip archive that contains the files and directories from the specified directory.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 文件系统中的目录结构将保留在存档中。The directory structure from the file system is preserved in the archive. 如果目录为空，则将创建一个空的存档。If the directory is empty, an empty archive is created. 此方法重载不包括存档中的基目录，并且不允许指定压缩级别。This method overload does not include the base directory in the archive and does not allow you to specify a compression level. 如果要包括基目录或指定压缩级别，请调用 方法重载。If you want to include the base directory or specify a compression level, call the method overload. 如果存档已存在，则会引发 异常。If the archive already exists, an exception is thrown. 如果存档中已经存在具有指定名称的条目，则将使用相同的名称创建另一个条目。If an entry with the specified name already exists in the archive, a second entry is created with an identical name. 如果无法将目录中的某个文件添加到存档，则存档将不完整并且无效，方法会引发 异常。If a file in the directory cannot be added to the archive, the archive is left incomplete and invalid, and the method throws an exception. ## Examples 此示例演示如何使用 类创建和提取 zip 存档。This example shows how to create and extract a zip archive by using the class. 它将文件夹的内容压缩为 zip 存档，然后将该内容提取到新文件夹中。It compresses the contents of a folder into a zip archive, and then extracts that content to a new folder. 若要使用 类，必须在项目中引用 `System.IO.Compression.FileSystem` 程序集。To use the class, you must reference the `System.IO.Compression.FileSystem` assembly in your project. [!code-csharp[System.IO.Compression.ZipFile#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.io.compression.zipfile/cs/program1.cs#1)] [!code-vb[System.IO.Compression.ZipFile#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.io.compression.zipfile/vb/program1.vb#1)]

exception.span: 无效或不存在（例如，在未映射的驱动器上）。

span.span: is invalid or does not exist (for example, it is on an unmapped drive).

exception.span: 已存在。

exception.span: 未能打开指定目录中的文件。

span.span: A file in the specified directory could not be opened.

span.span: specifies a directory.

exception.span: 调用方不具有访问在 中指定的目录或在 中指定的文件的所需权限。

span.span: The caller does not have the required permission to access the directory specified in or the file specified in .

span.span: or contains an invalid format.

span.span: The zip archive does not support writing.

param.name: compressionLevel
param.span: 指示创建项时是否强调速度或压缩有效性的枚举值之一。

span.span: One of the enumeration values that indicates whether to emphasize speed or compression effectiveness when creating the entry.

param.span: 包括从在存档的根的 的目录名称，则为 ；仅包含目录中的内容，则为 。

summary.span: 创建 zip 存档，该存档包括指定目录的文件和目录，使用指定压缩级别，以及可以选择包含基目录。

span.span: Creates a zip archive that contains the files and directories from the specified directory, uses the specified compression level, and optionally includes the base directory.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 文件系统中的目录结构将保留在存档中。The directory structure from the file system is preserved in the archive. 如果目录为空，则将创建一个空的存档。If the directory is empty, an empty archive is created. 使用此方法重载可指定压缩级别，并指定是否在存档中包括基目录。Use this method overload to specify the compression level and whether to include the base directory in the archive. 如果存档已存在，则会引发 异常。If the archive already exists, an exception is thrown. 如果存档中已经存在具有指定名称的条目，则将使用相同的名称创建另一个条目。If an entry with the specified name already exists in the archive, a second entry is created with an identical name. 如果无法将目录中的某个文件添加到存档，则存档将不完整并且无效，方法会引发 异常。If a file in the directory cannot be added to the archive, the archive is left incomplete and invalid, and the method throws an exception. ## Examples 此示例演示如何使用 类创建和提取 zip 存档。This example shows how to create and extract a zip archive by using the class. 它将文件夹的内容压缩为 zip 存档，然后将该内容提取到新文件夹中。It compresses the contents of a folder into a zip archive, and then extracts that content to a new folder. 压缩存档时，将包括基目录，并设置压缩级别以强调操作的速度，从而提高效率。When compressing the archive, the base directory is included and the compression level is set to emphasize the speed of the operation over efficiency. 若要使用 类，必须在项目中引用 `System.IO.Compression.FileSystem` 程序集。To use the class, you must reference the `System.IO.Compression.FileSystem` assembly in your project. [!code-csharp[System.IO.Compression.ZipFile#2](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.io.compression.zipfile/cs/program2.cs#2)] [!code-vb[System.IO.Compression.ZipFile#2](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.io.compression.zipfile/vb/program2.vb#2)]

Public Shared Sub CreateFromDirectory (sourceDirectoryName As String, destinationArchiveFileName As String, compressionLevel As CompressionLevel, includeBaseDirectory As Boolean, entryNameEncoding As Encoding)

public: static void CreateFromDirectory(System::String ^ sourceDirectoryName, System::String ^ destinationArchiveFileName, System::IO::Compression::CompressionLevel compressionLevel, bool includeBaseDirectory, System::Text::Encoding ^ entryNameEncoding);
static member CreateFromDirectory : string * string * System.IO.Compression.CompressionLevel * bool * System.Text.Encoding -> unit

param.name: sourceDirectoryName
param.span: 要存档的目录的路径，指定为相对路径或绝对路径。

span.span: The path to the directory to be archived, specified as a relative or absolute path.

param.span: 相对路径是指相对于当前工作目录的路径。

span.span: A relative path is interpreted as relative to the current working directory.

param.name: destinationArchiveFileName
param.span: 要生成的存档路径，指定为相对路径或绝对路径。

span.span: The path of the archive to be created, specified as a relative or absolute path.

param.span: 相对路径是指相对于当前工作目录的路径。

span.span: A relative path is interpreted as relative to the current working directory.

param.name: compressionLevel
param.span: 指示创建项时是否强调速度或压缩有效性的枚举值之一。

span.span: One of the enumeration values that indicates whether to emphasize speed or compression effectiveness when creating the entry.

param.name: includeBaseDirectory
param.span: 包括从在存档的根的 的目录名称，则为 ；仅包含目录中的内容，则为 。

span.span: to include the directory name from at the root of the archive; to include only the contents of the directory.

param.name: entryNameEncoding
param.span: 在存档中读取或写入项名时使用的编码。

span.span: The encoding to use when reading or writing entry names in this archive.

param.span: 仅当需要针对具有不支持项名的 UTF-8 编码的 zip 归档工具和库的互操作性进行编码时，为此参数指定一个值。

span.span: Specify a value for this parameter only when an encoding is required for interoperability with zip archive tools and libraries that do not support UTF-8 encoding for entry names.

summary.span: 创建 zip 存档，该存档包括文件和指定目录的目录，使用指定压缩级别和条目名称的字符编码，以及可以选择包含基目录。

span.span: Creates a zip archive that contains the files and directories from the specified directory, uses the specified compression level and character encoding for entry names, and optionally includes the base directory.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 文件系统中的目录结构将保留在存档中。The directory structure from the file system is preserved in the archive. 如果目录为空，则将创建一个空的存档。If the directory is empty, an empty archive is created. 使用此方法重载可指定压缩级别和字符编码，以及是否在存档中包括基目录。Use this method overload to specify the compression level and character encoding, and whether to include the base directory in the archive. 如果存档已存在，则会引发 异常。If the archive already exists, an exception is thrown. 如果存档中已经存在具有指定名称的条目，则将使用相同的名称创建另一个条目。If an entry with the specified name already exists in the archive, a second entry is created with an identical name. 如果无法将目录中的某个文件添加到存档，则存档将不完整并且无效，方法会引发 异常。If a file in the directory cannot be added to the archive, the archive is left incomplete and invalid, and the method throws an exception. 如果 `entryNameEncoding` 设置为 `null`以外的值，则将使用指定的编码对条目名称进行编码。If `entryNameEncoding` is set to a value other than `null`, the entry names are encoded by using the specified encoding. 如果指定的编码为 UTF-8，则为每个条目设置语言编码标志（本地文件头的通用位标志）。If the specified encoding is a UTF-8, the language encoding flag (in the general-purpose bit flag of the local file header) is set for each entry, 如果 `entryNameEncoding` 设置为 `null`，则根据以下规则对条目名称进行编码：If `entryNameEncoding` is set to `null`, the entry names are encoded according to the following rules: - 对于包含 ASCII 范围外的字符的条目名称，设置语言编码标志，并使用 UTF-8 对条目名称进行编码。For entry names that contain characters outside the ASCII range, the language encoding flag is set, and UTF-8 is used to encode the entry name. - 对于仅包含 ASCII 字符的条目名称，会设置语言编码标志，当前系统默认代码页用于对条目名称进行编码。For entry names that contain only ASCII characters, the language encoding flag is set, and the current system default code page is used to encode the entry names.

-or-

summary.span: 将指定 zip 存档中的所有文件都解压缩到文件系统的一个目录下。

span.span: Extracts all the files in the specified zip archive to a directory on the file system.

MemberSignature.Value: public static void ExtractToDirectory (string sourceArchiveFileName, string destinationDirectoryName);
.method public static hidebysig void ExtractToDirectory(string sourceArchiveFileName, string destinationDirectoryName) cil managed
Public Shared Sub ExtractToDirectory (sourceArchiveFileName As String, destinationDirectoryName As String)
public: static void ExtractToDirectory(System::String ^ sourceArchiveFileName, System::String ^ destinationDirectoryName);
static member ExtractToDirectory : string * string -> unit

param.name: sourceArchiveFileName
param.span: 要解压缩存档的路径。

span.span: The path to the archive that is to be extracted.

param.name: destinationDirectoryName
param.span: 到放置解压缩文件的目录的路径，指定为相对路径或绝对路径。

span.span: The path to the directory in which to place the extracted files, specified as a relative or absolute path.

param.span: 相对路径是指相对于当前工作目录的路径。

span.span: A relative path is interpreted as relative to the current working directory.

summary.span: 将指定 zip 存档中的所有文件都解压缩到文件系统的一个目录下。

span.span: Extracts all the files in the specified zip archive to a directory on the file system.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此方法将创建指定的目录和所有子目录。This method creates the specified directory and all subdirectories. 目标目录不能已存在。The destination directory cannot already exist. 提取之前，将引发与验证 `destinationDirectoryName` 或 `sourceArchiveFileName` 参数中的路径相关的异常。Exceptions related to validating the paths in the `destinationDirectoryName` or `sourceArchiveFileName` parameters are thrown before extraction. 否则，如果在提取过程中发生错误，存档将保留部分提取。Otherwise, if an error occurs during extraction, the archive remains partially extracted. 每个提取的文件都具有与指定的目录的相对路径 `destinationDirectoryName`，因为其源条目必须是存档的根。Each extracted file has the same relative path to the directory specified by `destinationDirectoryName` as its source entry has to the root of the archive. ## Examples 此示例演示如何使用 类创建和提取 zip 存档。This example shows how to create and extract a zip archive by using the class. 它将文件夹的内容压缩为 zip 存档，并将该内容提取到新文件夹中。It compresses the contents of a folder into a zip archive and extracts that content to a new folder. 若要使用 类，必须在项目中引用 `System.IO.Compression.FileSystem` 程序集。To use the class, you must reference the `System.IO.Compression.FileSystem` assembly in your project. [!code-csharp[System.IO.Compression.ZipFile#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.io.compression.zipfile/cs/program1.cs#1)] [!code-vb[System.IO.Compression.ZipFile#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.io.compression.zipfile/vb/program1.vb#1)]

exception.span: 或 是 ，仅包含空格，或包含至少一个无效字符。

span.span: or is , contains only white space, or contains at least one invalid character.

exception.span: 或 为 。

span.span: or is .

exception.span: 或 中的指定路径超过了系统定义的最大长度。

span.span: The specified path in or exceeds the system-defined maximum length.

exception.span: 指定的路径无效（例如，它位于未映射的驱动器上）。

span.span: The specified path is invalid (for example, it is on an unmapped drive).

exception.span: 指定的目录已存在。

span.span: The directory specified by already exists.
-or-

exception.span: 一个在存档中的输入名称是 ，仅包含空白或包含至少一个无效字符。

span.span: The name of an entry in the archive is , contains only white space, or contains at least one invalid character.
-or-

exception.span: 提取存档条目将生成在 指定的目录之外的一个文件。

span.span: Extracting an archive entry would create a file that is outside the directory specified by .

exception.span: （例如，如果该输入名称包括父目录访问器，则这可能发生。）

span.span: (For example, this might happen if the entry name contains parent directory accessors.)
-or-

exception.span: 提取存档项，其名称与已从相同存档提取的项相同。

span.span: An archive entry to extract has the same name as an entry that has already been extracted from the same archive.

exception.span: 调用方不具有访问存档或目标目录的所需权限。

span.span: The caller does not have the required permission to access the archive or the destination directory.

exception.span: 或 包含的格式无效。

span.span: or contains an invalid format.

exception.span: 未找到 。

span.span: was not found.

exception.span: 由 指定的存档不是有效 zip 存档。

span.span: The archive specified by is not a valid zip archive.
-or-

MemberSignature.Value: public static void ExtractToDirectory (string sourceArchiveFileName, string destinationDirectoryName, bool overwriteFiles);
.method public static hidebysig void ExtractToDirectory(string sourceArchiveFileName, string destinationDirectoryName, bool overwriteFiles) cil managed
Public Shared Sub ExtractToDirectory (sourceArchiveFileName As String, destinationDirectoryName As String, overwriteFiles As Boolean)
public: static void ExtractToDirectory(System::String ^ sourceArchiveFileName, System::String ^ destinationDirectoryName, bool overwriteFiles);
static member ExtractToDirectory : string * string * bool -> unit

param.name: sourceArchiveFileName
param.span: 文件系统上指向要解压缩的存档的路径。

span.span: The path on the file system to the archive that is to be extracted.

param.name: destinationDirectoryName
param.span: 文件系统上指向目标目录的路径。

span.span: The path to the destination directory on the file system.

param.span: 指定的目录必须不存在，但包含它的目录必须存在。

span.span: The directory specified must not exist, but the directory that it is contained in must exist.

param.name: overwriteFiles
param.span: 要覆盖文件，则为 ；否则为 。

span.span: to overwrite files; otherwise.

summary.span: 将指定存档中的所有文件都解压缩到文件系统的某目录下。

span.span: Extracts all of the files in the specified archive to a directory on the file system.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 指定的目录不能存在。The specified directory must not exist. 方法创建指定的目录和所有子目录。The method creates the specified directory and all subdirectories. 如果提取存档时出现错误，存档将保持部分提取。If there is an error while extracting the archive, the archive will remain partially extracted. 将提取每个条目，以使提取的文件与 `destinationDirectoryName` 的相对路径相同，因为该条目必须是存档。Each entry will be extracted such that the extracted file has the same relative path to the `destinationDirectoryName` as the entry has to the archive. 路径可以指定相对或绝对路径信息。The path can specify relative or absolute path information. 相对路径是指相对于当前工作目录的路径。A relative path is interpreted as relative to the current working directory. 如果要存档的文件具有无效的上次修改时间，则将使用 Zip 时间戳格式的第一个日期和时间（在1980年1月1日午夜）。If a file to be archived has an invalid last modified time, the first date and time representable in the Zip timestamp format (midnight on January 1, 1980) will be used.

MemberSignature.Value: public static void ExtractToDirectory (string sourceArchiveFileName, string destinationDirectoryName, System.Text.Encoding entryNameEncoding);
.method public static hidebysig void ExtractToDirectory(string sourceArchiveFileName, string destinationDirectoryName, class System.Text.Encoding entryNameEncoding) cil managed
Public Shared Sub ExtractToDirectory (sourceArchiveFileName As String, destinationDirectoryName As String, entryNameEncoding As Encoding)
public: static void ExtractToDirectory(System::String ^ sourceArchiveFileName, System::String ^ destinationDirectoryName, System::Text::Encoding ^ entryNameEncoding);
static member ExtractToDirectory : string * string * System.Text.Encoding -> unit

param.name: sourceArchiveFileName
param.span: 要解压缩存档的路径。

span.span: The path to the archive that is to be extracted.

param.name: destinationDirectoryName
param.span: 到放置解压缩文件的目录的路径，指定为相对路径或绝对路径。

span.span: The path to the directory in which to place the extracted files, specified as a relative or absolute path.

param.span: 相对路径是指相对于当前工作目录的路径。

span.span: A relative path is interpreted as relative to the current working directory.

param.name: entryNameEncoding
param.span: 在存档中读取或写入项名时使用的编码。

span.span: The encoding to use when reading or writing entry names in this archive.

param.span: 仅当需要针对具有不支持项名的 UTF-8 编码的 zip 归档工具和库的互操作性进行编码时，为此参数指定一个值。

span.span: Specify a value for this parameter only when an encoding is required for interoperability with zip archive tools and libraries that do not support UTF-8 encoding for entry names.

summary.span: 将指定 zip 存档中的所有文件解压缩到文件系统的一目录下，并使用项名称的指定字符编码。

span.span: Extracts all the files in the specified zip archive to a directory on the file system and uses the specified character encoding for entry names.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此方法将创建指定的目录和所有子目录。This method creates the specified directory and all subdirectories. 目标目录不能已存在。The destination directory cannot already exist. 提取之前，将引发与验证 `destinationDirectoryName` 或 `sourceArchiveFileName` 参数中的路径相关的异常。Exceptions related to validating the paths in the `destinationDirectoryName` or `sourceArchiveFileName` parameters are thrown before extraction. 否则，如果在提取过程中发生错误，存档将保留部分提取。Otherwise, if an error occurs during extraction, the archive remains partially extracted. 每个提取的文件都具有与指定的目录的相对路径 `destinationDirectoryName`，因为其源条目必须是存档的根。Each extracted file has the same relative path to the directory specified by `destinationDirectoryName` as its source entry has to the root of the archive. 如果 `entryNameEncoding` 设置为 `null`以外的值，则根据以下规则对条目名称进行解码：If `entryNameEncoding` is set to a value other than `null`, entry names are decoded according to the following rules: - 对于未设置语言编码标志（本地文件头的通用位标志）的入口名称，使用指定的编码对条目名称进行解码。For entry names where the language encoding flag (in the general-purpose bit flag of the local file header) is not set, the entry names are decoded by using the specified encoding. - 对于设置了语言编码标志的条目，使用 UTF-8 对条目名称进行解码。For entries where the language encoding flag is set, the entry names are decoded by using UTF-8. 如果 `entryNameEncoding` 设置为 `null`，则根据以下规则对条目名称进行解码：If `entryNameEncoding` is set to `null`, entry names are decoded according to the following rules: - 对于未设置语言编码标志（本地文件头的通用位标志）的条目，将使用当前系统默认代码页对条目名称进行解码。For entries where the language encoding flag (in the general-purpose bit flag of the local file header) is not set, entry names are decoded by using the current system default code page. - 对于设置了语言编码标志的条目，使用 UTF-8 对条目名称进行解码。For entries where the language encoding flag is set, the entry names are decoded by using UTF-8.

MemberSignature.Value: public static System.IO.Compression.ZipArchive Open (string archiveFileName, System.IO.Compression.ZipArchiveMode mode);
.method public static hidebysig class System.IO.Compression.ZipArchive Open(string archiveFileName, valuetype System.IO.Compression.ZipArchiveMode mode) cil managed
Public Shared Function Open (archiveFileName As String, mode As ZipArchiveMode) As ZipArchive
public: static System::IO::Compression::ZipArchive ^ Open(System::String ^ archiveFileName, System::IO::Compression::ZipArchiveMode mode);
static member Open : string * System.IO.Compression.ZipArchiveMode -> System.IO.Compression.ZipArchive

param.name: archiveFileName
param.span: 要打开的存档的路径，指定为相对路径或绝对路径。

span.span: The path to the archive to open, specified as a relative or absolute path.

param.span: 相对路径是指相对于当前工作目录的路径。

span.span: A relative path is interpreted as relative to the current working directory.

param.name: mode
param.span: 一个枚举值指定在开放的存档项的操作。

span.span: One of the enumeration values that specifies the actions which are allowed on the entries in the opened archive.

summary.span: 以指定的模式打开指定路径上的 zip 归档。

span.span: Opens a zip archive at the specified path and in the specified mode.
The opened zip archive.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 将 `mode` 参数设置为 时，会以文件模式值的形式从 枚举中 打开存档。When you set the `mode` parameter to , the archive is opened with from the enumeration as the file mode value. 如果存档不存在，则会引发 异常。If the archive does not exist, a exception is thrown. 将 `mode` 参数设置为 等效于调用 方法。Setting the `mode` parameter to is equivalent to calling the method. 将 `mode` 参数设置为 时，会以 文件模式值打开存档。When you set the `mode` parameter to , the archive is opened with as the file mode value. 如果存档已存在，则会引发 。If the archive already exists, an is thrown. 将 `mode` 参数设置为 时，会以 文件模式值打开存档。When you set the `mode` parameter to , the archive is opened with as the file mode value. 如果存档存在，则将其打开。If the archive exists, it is opened. 可以修改现有条目并创建新条目。The existing entries can be modified and new entries can be created. 如果存档不存在，则创建新的存档;但是，在 模式下创建 zip 存档并不像在 模式下创建它那样高效。If the archive does not exist, a new archive is created; however, creating a zip archive in mode is not as efficient as creating it in mode. ## Examples 下面的示例演示如何在更新模式下打开 zip 存档并将条目添加到存档。The following example shows how to open a zip archive in the update mode and add an entry to the archive. [!code-csharp[System.IO.Compression.ZipArchive#3](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.io.compression.ziparchive/cs/program3.cs#3)] [!code-vb[System.IO.Compression.ZipArchive#3](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.io.compression.ziparchive/vb/program3.vb#3)]

param.name: archiveFileName
param.span: 要打开的存档的路径，指定为相对路径或绝对路径。

span.span: The path to the archive to open, specified as a relative or absolute path.

span.span: A relative path is interpreted as relative to the current working directory.

param.name: mode

span.span: One of the enumeration values that specifies the actions that are allowed on the entries in the opened archive.

param.name: entryNameEncoding
param.span: 在存档中读取或写入项名时使用的编码。

span.span: The encoding to use when reading or writing entry names in this archive.

param.span: 仅当需要针对具有不支持条目名称的 UTF-8 编码的 zip 归档工具和库的互操作性进行编码时，为此参数指定值。

span.span: Specify a value for this parameter only when an encoding is required for interoperability with zip archive tools and libraries that do not support UTF-8 encoding for entry names.

summary.span: 在指定的模式中用指定的项名称汉字解码打开指定路径的 zip 存档。

span.span: Opens a zip archive at the specified path, in the specified mode, and by using the specified character encoding for entry names.
The opened zip archive.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 将 `mode` 参数设置为 时，会以 文件模式值打开存档。When you set the `mode` parameter to , the archive is opened with as the file mode value. 如果存档不存在，则会引发 异常。If the archive does not exist, a exception is thrown. 将 `mode` 参数设置为 等效于调用 方法。Setting the `mode` parameter to is equivalent to calling the method. 将 `mode` 参数设置为 时，会以 文件模式值打开存档。When you set the `mode` parameter to , the archive is opened with as the file mode value. 如果存档已存在，则会引发 。If the archive already exists, an is thrown. 将 `mode` 参数设置为 时，会以 文件模式值打开存档。When you set the `mode` parameter to , the archive is opened with as the file mode value. 如果存档存在，则将其打开。If the archive exists, it is opened. 可以修改现有条目并创建新条目。The existing entries can be modified and new entries can be created. 如果存档不存在，则创建新的存档;但是，在 模式下创建 zip 存档并不像在 模式下创建它那样高效。If the archive does not exist, a new archive is created; however, creating a zip archive in mode is not as efficient as creating it in mode. 打开要读取的 zip 存档文件并将 `entryNameEncoding` 设置为 `null`时，将根据以下规则对条目名称进行解码：When you open a zip archive file for reading and `entryNameEncoding` is set to `null`, entry names are decoded according to the following rules: - 如果未设置本地文件头的语言编码标志（位于本地文件头的通用位标志），则使用当前系统默认代码页对条目名称进行解码。When the language encoding flag (in the general-purpose bit flag of the local file header) is not set, the current system default code page is used to decode the entry name. - 如果设置了语言编码标志，则使用 UTF-8 对条目名称进行解码。When the language encoding flag is set, UTF-8 is used to decode the entry name. 打开 zip 存档文件进行读取，并将 `entryNameEncoding` 设置为 `null`以外的值时，将根据以下规则对条目名称进行解码：When you open a zip archive file for reading and `entryNameEncoding` is set to a value other than `null`, entry names are decoded according to the following rules: - 如果未设置语言编码标志，则使用指定的 `entryNameEncoding` 对项名称进行解码。When the language encoding flag is not set, the specified `entryNameEncoding` is used to decode the entry name. - 如果设置了语言编码标志，则使用 UTF-8 对条目名称进行解码。When the language encoding flag is set, UTF-8 is used to decode the entry name. 写入存档文件并将 `entryNameEncoding` 设置为 `null`时，将根据以下规则对条目名称进行编码：When you write to archive files and `entryNameEncoding` is set to `null`, entry names are encoded according to the following rules: - 对于包含 ASCII 范围外的字符的条目名称，设置语言编码标志，并使用 UTF-8 对条目名称进行编码。For entry names that contain characters outside the ASCII range, the language encoding flag is set, and entry names are encoded by using UTF-8. - 对于仅包含 ASCII 字符的条目名称，未设置语言编码标志，并且通过使用当前系统默认代码页对条目名称进行编码。For entry names that contain only ASCII characters, the language encoding flag is not set, and entry names are encoded by using the current system default code page. 当你写入存档文件并且 `entryNameEncoding` 设置为 `null`以外的值时，将使用指定的 `entryNameEncoding` 将输入名称编码为个字节。When you write to archive files and `entryNameEncoding` is set to a value other than `null`, the specified `entryNameEncoding` is used to encode the entry names into bytes. 仅当指定的编码为 UTF-8 编码时，才设置语言编码标志（本地文件头的通用位标志）。The language encoding flag (in the general-purpose bit flag of the local file header) is set only when the specified encoding is a UTF-8 encoding.

MemberSignature.Value: public static System.IO.Compression.ZipArchive OpenRead (string archiveFileName);
.method public static hidebysig class System.IO.Compression.ZipArchive OpenRead(string archiveFileName) cil managed
Public Shared Function OpenRead (archiveFileName As String) As ZipArchive
public: static System::IO::Compression::ZipArchive ^ OpenRead(System::String ^ archiveFileName);
static member OpenRead : string -> System.IO.Compression.ZipArchive

param.name: archiveFileName
param.span: 要打开的存档的路径，指定为相对路径或绝对路径。

span.span: The path to the archive to open, specified as a relative or absolute path.

param.span: 相对路径是指相对于当前工作目录的路径。

span.span: A relative path is interpreted as relative to the current working directory.

summary.span: 打开在指定路径用于读取的 zip 存档。

span.span: Opens a zip archive for reading at the specified path.
The opened zip archive.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此方法等效于调用 方法，并将 `mode` 参数设置为 。This method is equivalent to calling the method and setting the `mode` parameter to . 存档以 "文件模式" 值 打开。The archive is opened with as the file mode value. 如果存档不存在，则会引发 异常。If the archive does not exist, a exception is thrown. ## Examples 下面的示例演示如何打开 zip 存档以进行读取。The following example shows how to open a zip archive for reading. [!code-csharp[System.IO.Compression.ZipArchive#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.io.compression.ziparchive/cs/program1.cs#1)] [!code-vb[System.IO.Compression.ZipArchive#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.io.compression.ziparchive/vb/program1.vb#1)]
